response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your company. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $1,200,000. Considering its immense worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1,050,000. This offer is designed to provide you with an opportunity to maximize your investment while securing a competitive edge in your market. I look forward to discussing the details with you and exploring how we can collaborate to achieve mutual success.", "product_price": 1050000}
